thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: MIKE

author: MIKE
title: MIKE
text:
Easy to arrange for a mechanic online, no trying to organise to drop off the car, and the mechanic was friendly, very thorough in explaining what work needed to be done, to a non-mechanic like me!
The service is very courteous and sends texts/email reminders and follow up on the time the mechanic will arrive.
Detailed invoice emailed with further information on the car. Very impressed with the service and work they did to the car, great job- highly recommend!
